text:
Hello! When I do:
```hs create template article templates/blog```
and select `blog` as the type of template, I see on my local file the following header:
```<!--
    templateType: blog
    label: Blog
    isAvailableForNewContent: true
-->```
However, when I go to `design tools` I do see this extra header on top of the other one:
```<!--
  templateType: "none"
  isAvailableForNewContent: false
-->```
It does not happen when I select `Page` as the type of template and I was wondering if I'm doing anything wrong when creating a `blog`
